abstract: Speaking in Jerusalem, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said the city had no "plan of action" to stop Occupy Wall Street.
snippet: Speaking in Jerusalem, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said the city had no "plan of action" to stop Occupy Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: For Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, the specter of Occupy Wall Street looms large - even in Jerusalem.

headline.main: Even in Jerusalem, Thoughts Stray to Zuccotti Park
